about_the_game:
BeachHead Gold Edition

Step back into your (childhood) memories with the BeachHead Gold Edition!
Relive the exhilaration of defending the beach against relentless enemy forces in three iconic titles: BeachHead 2000, BeachHead 2002, and BeachHead 3000 (Desert War). Do you recall your best score? How many levels did you pass? Whether you spent endless hours playing solo or sharing with your dad, son, or friends, it is time to let go of the everyday noise and get lost in the memory of a great game

Key Features:

Three Classic Titles: Play BeachHead 2000, BeachHead 2002, and BeachHead Desert Striker, beloved classics that have stood the test of time. Immerse yourself in intense first-person shooter gameplay as you defend the beach against waves of enemies.

Level Editor: Unleash your creativity with the included level editor for all three games. Design custom levels, create unique challenges, and share your creations with the community.

Compete on the Leaderboards: Test your skills against other players on the dedicated leaderboard for player-created levels. Rise to the top and prove yourself as the ultimate BeachHead champion.

Enhanced Compatibility: Play on modern Windows versions with ease, thanks to enhanced compatibility features. Say goodbye to technical hurdles and enjoy seamless gameplay right out of the box.

Optimized Controls: Say goodbye to mouse sensitivity issues with our revamped game launcher. Enjoy precise and responsive controls for a smoother gaming experience.

Join the Battle: Whether you're a seasoned retro gamer longing for a nostalgic trip down memory lane or a newcomer eager to experience classic arcade action, the BeachHead Gold Edition offers something for everyone. Relive the glory days of gaming and immerse yourself in the timeless thrill of defending the beach against enemy onslaughts. With its classic gameplay, enhanced features, and compatibility with modern systems, this edition is a must-have for retro gaming enthusiasts and newcomers alike. Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey and unleash your inner arcade hero in the ultimate battle for victory!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Originally released for Windows XP, the game can be played on Windows 10 and Windows 11 OS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9550 | AMD Phenom II X4 945 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX-compatible video card that supports 16bit graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card.

short_description: Relive arcade glory with BeachHead Gold Edition! Defend beaches, conquer deserts in timeless classics BeachHead 2000, 2002, and Desert Striker. Craft levels, compete on leaderboards. Perfect for retro gamers seeking nostalgic thrills!
